release.action: Amend cpd-report.properties contents to refer to report.cpd.* properties.
Base distribution.xml assembly file on maven-pldoc-plugin rather than pldoc version.
Create cpd-report.properties resource bundle for site report and change reference in plugin from pldoc-report to cpd-report.

release.description: Add Maven support for CPD against PL/SQL within files or database.
